meanings.definition: A flatworm of the phylum Platyhelminthes.
meanings.sent1: The platyhelminth was a thin, flat creature.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the platyhelminth to learn more about flatworms.
meanings.sent3: The platyhelminth tried to do somersaults but couldn't because of its shape.
meanings.sent4: In the world of flatworms, the platyhelminth was the star of the show.
meanings.sent5: Children's books often feature the colorful platyhelminth to teach about flatworms.

meanings.definition: Any invertebrate of the phylum Platyhelminthes, including flatworms.
meanings.sent1: The pond was teeming with various platyhelminths.
meanings.sent2: Biologists found a new species of platyhelminth in the deep sea.
meanings.sent3: The platyhelminth threw a party for all its invertebrate friends.
meanings.sent4: The platyhelminth, a master of disguise, blended in perfectly with its surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The aquarium showcased a diverse collection of colorful platyhelminths.
